description_0: An indoor medium close up three-quarter right side front view of a long silver train traveling from right to left on a railroad track. The front of the train is colored black, and has a silver door in the center. There is a sticker of the American flag to the right of the door, and beneath the flag is a silver circle sticker that has blue lettering on it. To the left of the door is a rectangular shaped transparent window, and above the door is a red circular light that has a red lit up letter "E" in the center of it. To the right of the train is a walking platform made up of square shaped gray tiles, and to the left of the gray tiles are two rows of yellow tiles that separate the train from the walkway. Directly to the left of the train is a white wall made up of small white colored square tiles.
description_1: A closeup, 3/4's view of two subway train tracks separated by a row of black metal supports. A station platform with a yellow safety line with raised bumps is on either side of the train tracks. The left platform has a row of yellow metal support beams spaced out evenly."14" is written in white text on top of a black square sticker placed on the upper section of every yellow support beam. There are no trains on the tracks. The light from overhead florescent lights are reflecting off of the station floor. At the far end of the right platform, there is a red ceiling sign that says "NO EXIT" in white text.
